comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Seymour (Sey) Lappen of Avon CT died on 17 November 2008. He was a WWII veteran and ran the family's fireplace business, Lappen's Hearth and Home (established in 1892). Phyllis Rosenberg Lappen was his widow. Seymour Lappen's obituary
